alert.note: Alert for Armstrong; Carson; Donley (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 6:27PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Armstrong, southeastern Carson, southwestern Gray and northwestern Donley Counties through 700 PM CDT... At 627 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 5 miles northeast of Claude to Howardwick. Movement was northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Panhandle, Groom, Howardwick, Alanreed, Lake Mcclellan and Greenbelt Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
